name: FitFolio Dev Container
postCreateCommand: bash -c 'python -m pip install -r backend/requirements-dev.txt && (command -v docker || (curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com | sh)) && (command -v npm && npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code || echo "npm not available yet")'
postStartCommand: bash -c 'git config --global --add safe.directory /workspaces/fitfolio 2>/dev/null || true && mkdir -p ~/.ssh && chmod 700 ~/.ssh && test -f /root/.ssh/known_hosts && cp /root/.ssh/known_hosts ~/.ssh/known_hosts || true && ssh-keyscan -H github.com >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts 2>/dev/null || true && .devcontainer/scripts/configure-git.sh && pre-commit install --install-hooks --hook-type pre-commit --hook-type pre-push'
